tool.name: analysis
tool.command:
tripaille analysis load_go "$name" "$program" "$programversion" "$sourcename" "$gaf_output"
#if $gaf_ext: --gaf_ext "$gaf_ext" #end if #if $query_type: --query_type "$query_type" #end if #if $query_uniquename: $query_uniquename #end if #if $method: --method "$method" #end if #if $re_name: --re_name "$re_name" #end if #if $no_wait: $no_wait #end if #if $algorithm: --algorithm "$algorithm" #end if #if $sourceversion: --sourceversion "$sourceversion" #end if #if $sourceuri: --sourceuri "$sourceuri" #end if #if $description: --description "$description" #end if #if $date_executed: --date_executed "$date_executed" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: gaf_output
param.label: Gaf Output
param.help: Path to the GAF file to load (single file, or directory containing multiple GAF files)

param.name: gaf_ext
param.label: Gaf Ext
param.help: If looking for files in a directory, extension of the GAF files

param.name: query_type
param.label: Query Type
param.help: The feature type (e.g. 'gene', 'mRNA', 'contig') of the query. It must be a valid Sequence Ontology term.

param.name: query_uniquename
param.label: Query Uniquename
param.help: Use this if the --query-re regular expression matches unique names instead of names in the database.

param.name: re_name
param.label: Re Name
param.help: Regular expression to extract the feature name from GAF file.

param.name: no_wait
param.label: No Wait
param.help: Do not wait for job to complete
